baseline_groups.claim_summary: First-term mayors (eligible for reelection) have lower corruption than term-limited second-term mayors
baseline_groups.notes: Cross-sectional OLS with state FE. Three outcome measures: pcorrupt (share), ncorrupt (count), ncorrupt_os (share of items).

global_notes: Surface-driven run. All baseline groups match the pre-run surface. No adjustments needed.
